articles.title: National Meeting Celebrates War Victory Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Celebrates War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Friday to celebrate the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae and Hyon Yong Chol, officials of party, military, power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, delegates of war veterans, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, meritorious persons, working people in Pyongyang, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that July 27 is the day of the second liberation of the country when the army and people of the DPRK beat back the U.S. imperialist aggressors which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and brought about the shining victory.
					
					 The Fatherland Liberation War was a just war for defending the freedom and sovereignty of the country, and the fiercest war unprecedented in world history of wars, he said, and continued:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists plunged into the war its huge aggression forces as well as forces of its 16 satellite countries and the south Korean puppet army, more than two million in all, and employed the most atrocious war methods and means.
					
					 But they could not bring to knees the army and people of the DPRK as they were led by Kim Il Sung, ever-victorious and iron-willed commander and gifted strategist.
					
					 The DPRK could defeat the formidable U.S. imperialists and their followers in the war because it had the Juche-oriented military ideas and outstanding strategy and tactics of Kim Il Sung and the indomitable fighting spirit of the army and people who upheld his leadership.
					
					 During the war, fraternal Chinese people and other world peace-loving people rendered active support and encouragement to the Koreans in their just sacred war.
					
					 Admirable sons and daughters of the Chinese people volunteered to the Korean front under the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland. They shared weal and woe in the same trench with the army and people of the DPRK, thus setting a noble example of internationalism in the struggle against common enemy.
					
					 We always remember this.
					
					 After the war the acute stand-off with the imperialists went on,
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il pursued the Songun politics in an over-all way and wisely led the nuclear stand-off with the U.S. and defended socialism, thus ushering in the era of fresh victory in the confrontation with the imperialists and the U.S.
					
					 The military parade that was held this year to celebrate the Day of the Sun on the initiative of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was a grand festival of victors that showed the military and technological superiority is no longer monopoly of the imperialists and gone never to return are the days when the U.S. threatened and blackmailed the DPRK with nuclear weapons.
					
					 Calling Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un's leadership a lifeline of the People's Army and banner of all victories, the reporter continued:
					
					 From his early years the dear respected Kim Jong Un was together with Kim Jong Il in his long journey of Songun leadership and made remarkable contributions to strengthening the KPA into reliable scout forces and core forces supporting the Songun revolution, and demonstrating the country's might as a world-level military power.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are fully demonstrating the fighting spirit of annihilating enemies with fixed conviction that victories will be in store for them as long as they advance under the leadership of Kim Jong Un who is possessed of offensive temperament of Mt. Paektu, outstanding commanding arts and iron luck and will.
					
					 Nearly six decades have passed since fireworks were displayed to celebrate the victory in the war but peace has not yet settled on this land and the situation still remains tense.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists remain unchanged in their aggression nature to stifle the DPRK by force and occupy the whole of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK do not want war but are never afraid of it.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are gravely mistaken if they think they can survive and their bases will be safe while working out scenario for war.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists ignite a new war on this land, the party will believe in the people and the people in the party and they will wage an all-people war to make the enemies sign the document of surrender, not armistice agreement and thus achieve the nation's cherished desire for reunification.

articles.title: Fireworks Display Marks War Victory Anniversary
articles.content:
Fireworks Display Marks War Victory Anniversary
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A fireworks display took place on the banks of the Pothong River on the evening of July 27, the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Various places of Pyongyang including Jonsung Square, Ponghwa Street, An Sang Thaek Street and Moran Hill along the banks of the Pothong River, around the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower, were crowded with spectators.
					
					 Enjoying the fireworks display were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Hwang Sun Hui, Ri Ul Sol, Kim Chol Man, Kim Jong Gak, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Kwak Pom Gi, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Chang Sop, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Pyong Sam, Jo Yon Jun, Thae Jong Su and Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the C.C., Korean Social Democratic Party, senior officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies and working people's organizations, officials of ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and the press, heroes and merited persons.
					
					 Among the spectators were delegates of war veterans to the celebrations of the 59th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 On the invitation there were the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas compatriots staying in motherland and foreigners.
					
					 Vice Marshal Kim Jong Gak, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a speech.
					
					 He said the historic victory in the war is attributable to the Juche-oriented military ideas, strategy and tactics of President Kim Il Sung and the indomitable mental power of the army and people united around the leader.
					
					 Today's fireworks display is a great festival to praise the Songun revolutionary exploits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who always emerged victorious and to demonstrate the heroic spirit of Songun Korea advancing towards a final victory under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, he stressed.
					
					 The fireworks display began with the song "July 27, Our Victory Day".
					
					 The fireworks display represented the feats of the Korean army and people that started U.S. imperialism on the downgrade by blowing up the myth of the U.S. "mightiness" and honorably defended the country.
					
					 Fireworks of various colors decorated the sky over Pyongyang.
					
					 The delegates felt grateful to Kim Jong Un for having invited them to the celebrations of the war victory day, including the wonderful fireworks display.
					
					 The fireworks display demonstrated the strong will of the Korean army and people to advance toward a final victory by glorifying the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for all ages and work in the spirit displayed during the Fatherland Liberation War, closely united around Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Banquets Given to Mark War Victory Day
articles.content:
Banquets Given to Mark War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Banquets for the delegates of war veterans to the celebrations of the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War were given at the Mokran House, People's Palace of Culture, Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant and the Yanggakdo International Hotel on Friday.
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam and Choe Yong Rim, chairperson of a friendly party, officials concerned and the delegates of war veterans to the celebrations.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and Pak To Chun made speeches at the banquets.
					
					 Speakers at the banquets warmly welcomed the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, war veterans and indomitable pro-reunification patriotic champions who were invited to the banquets arranged under the care of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The war veterans should hand over to the younger generations the ardent loyalty, collectivism and popular heroism which they displayed for the party, leader, country and people in the flames of the crucial war so that the cause of the WPK can be carried forward to the last through generations, they stressed.

articles.title: Unhasu July 27 Concert Celebrates War Victory Day
articles.content:
Unhasu July 27 Concert Celebrates War Victory Day 
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Unhasu July 27 concert was given at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre Friday.
					 Enjoying the concert were senior officials of the party and state including Choe Yong Rim, officials of ministries and national institutions, those in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, media, service persons of the Korean People's Army as well as Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 The concert began with Patriotic Song.
					
					 The performers sang highly of the undying feats for war victory by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, iron-willed and ever-victorious brilliant commander and legendary hero, and feats by heroic soldiers and other people who defended the country at the cost of their lives.
					
					 Numbers praised undying feats of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who defended the destiny of the country and nation and demonstrated the dignity of Juche Korea and won ever-victory in the stand-off with imperialism and the U.S. and the struggle for defending socialism with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 The audience was deeply moved by numbers like female solo "Song of Forerunner of Chollima Movement", mixed duet and pangchang "You Are My Mother" and mixed sextet and chorus "Our Beloved Leader".
					
					 The concert replete with revolutionary zeal and stamina was highly acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Concert Given by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Concert Given by State Merited Chorus
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A concert was given by the State Merited Chorus at the People's Theatre on Friday to celebrate the war victory day.
					 Among the audience were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam and Choe Ryong Hae, chairperson of a friendly party, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and working people in the city.
					
					 The concert began with the song "Leader and General Are Standing Together". Put on the stage were male choruses "Our July 27", "Song for Defending the Country", piano solo "To the Road of Decisive Battle", male solo and male chorus "Marshal Kim Il Sung Is Our Supreme Commander", female sole "Tell, Songun Road" and male choruses "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" and "Forward to Final Victory".
					
					  The performers sang high praises of the undying feats in the war victory Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, a gifted strategist and legendary hero, performed in smashing the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, and honorably defended the sovereignty of the country and nation.
					
					 The concert gave deep impressions to the audience as it reflected the unanimous aspiration and desire of all service persons and people to turn the war victory into the one of national reunification, true to the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, bearing deep in their mind the blessings of the illustrious leaders bestowed upon them generation after generation.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Friday, the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Youth and students packed the venues of dancing parties in Pyongyang including the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower and the Arch of Triumph to greet the significant war victory day with the joy of holding the dear respected Kim Jong Un as DPRK Marshal in high esteem.
					
					 Dancing parties began with song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The dancers danced to the tune of songs "Our July 27" and "Our Song Is the Song of Victory" with pride and self-confidence of living and struggling as youth of heroic Korea which won a brilliant victory after shattering the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 "General on a Galloping White Horse" and "Our General Is the Best" helped the dancers recollect the revolutionary career of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Other songs like "Straight Forward" and "At a Go" also blared to the tune of which the dancers continued dancing with the pride of displaying the honor of the reserve combat units and detached forces of the supreme commander and the most viable unit of socialist construction.
					
					 Demonstrated at the dancing party venues were the strong spirit of the young vanguard to become the fortress and shields defending Marshal Kim Jong Un at the cost of their lives just as the youth did in the war days, to wipe out all the vicious enemies who dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and glorify July 27 of victory forever.
					
					 Similar dancing parties of youth and students were held at the provincial seats Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Marks 59th Anniversary of Korean War Victory
articles.content:
DPRK Marks 59th Anniversary of Korean War Victory
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Festive events were held across the DPRK on the 59th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (Korean War).
					 They first visited the statues and smiling portraits of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il in Pyongyang, provincial seats and other places to pay homage. They also visited historical sites associated with the President's feats for the war victory.
					
					 Revolutionary drama "Following the Banner of Victory" was given at the National Theatrical Theatre in Pyongyang, acrobatic performances at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre and the Monranbong Circus Theatre and concerts at the Moranbong Theatre, the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the Yun I Sang Concert Hall to celebrate the war victory day.
					
					 Members of the Art Squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League performed at the plaza of the April 25 House of Culture, adding to the festive mood.
					
					 The Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea gave a performance "Our Eternal July 27" for workers and war veterans.
					
					 The Art Group of the C.C., the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and its some members gave a performance of wartime songs in front of the Fatherland Liberation War History Museum.
					
					 The agricultural workers union's members and agricultural workers in South Hamgyong Province presented the concert of wartime songs at the Joyang Cooperative Farm in Hamju County. Officials and members of the women's union in North Hamgyong Province presented an art performance of wartime songs at the construction site of the Orangchon Power Station and sang songs associated with boundless reverence for the peerlessly famous generals, encouraging the builders.
					
					 Performances were also given in Ryanggang, Kangwon, North and South Phyongan Provinces for war veterans and wartime merited persons. Members of the art squad of Kaesong City adjacent to the Demarcation Line gave performances for war veterans.
					
					 Youth and students across the country had dancing parties, adding to festive mood.

articles.title: Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble 
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Song and Dance Ensemble of the Korean People's Army (KPA) gave a performance at the April 25 House of Culture on Friday to celebrate the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Servicepersons of the KPA enjoyed the performance. 
					
					 It began with the preludes "Our Victory Day July 27" and "For My Only Motherland". Put on the stage were colorful numbers including mixed chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Song of National Defence", tap dance "Image of Hero" and female solo and dance "Where Are You, Dear General", famous masterpiece. 
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying exploits for the war victory made by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung who defeated the brigandish U.S. imperialists with his rare military wisdom, matchless grit and outstanding commanding arts and created a military miracle to be remembered long in the world history of wars. 
					
					 Through female solo "Thunder over Jong Il Peak", kayagum ensemble and pangchang "Arirang of Chol Pass" and "Ongheya for Songun Victory" and others, the performers also sang the exploits of Songun revolution of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who put the dignity of the country on the top level by providing ceaseless long journey of Songun leadership. 
					
					 Mixed sextet "Our Beloved Leader", male octet "We Will as Ever Defend Seas of the Country" and finales "Forward to Final Victory", etc. deeply impressed the audience.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life, school youth and children have visited statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il on the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Seen before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the party, military and power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, enterprises, factories, farms and schools at all levels in Pyongyang. Bouquets and flowers were also placed.
					
					 An endless stream of people visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Servicepersons, people of all social standings, school youth and children visited statues of the President at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of People's Security and other places in the capital city.
					
					 People across the country visited statues of the President in their residential areas to pay homage to him on the same occasion.

articles.title: War Veterans Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
War Veterans Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Delegates of war veterans laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday. They were invited to the celebrations of the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The delegates laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues before paying respects.

articles.title: Wreaths, Floral Baskets Laid before Cemeteries and War Victory Tower
articles.content:
Wreaths, Floral Baskets Laid before Cemeteries and War Victory Tower
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and floral baskets before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Friday, the 59th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Seen placed on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Attending the ceremonies of laying wreaths and floral baskets were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Choe Ryong Hae who are members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces, power bodies, social organizations, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Laid on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet. A floral basket in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee and the WPK Central Military Commission was placed before the main theme sculpture "Victory" of the memorial tower.
					
					 Also laid before them were wreaths and floral baskets in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, bodies of science, education, public health and media and party and power institutions and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of martyrs.
					
					 They paid noble respects to heroic soldiers who won the historic victory in the sacred war against the armed aggression by the U.S. imperialists and honorably defended the country's sovereignty and the revolutionary gains.
					
					 The military attaches corps here laid a wreath and floral basket before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the memorial tower on the same day.
					
					 Wreaths were laid before statues of martyrs, the monuments to the fallen fighters of the Korean People's Army and cemeteries and graves of martyrs across the country.

articles.title: Delegate Certificates Awarded to Participants in Celebrations of War Victory Day
articles.content:
Delegate Certificates Awarded to Participants in Celebrations of War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- War veterans, invited to the celebrations of the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953), received delegate certificates on Friday.
					 The certificate carries a picture of President Kim Il Sung in marshal's uniform standing on the tribune of the meeting to celebrate the victory in the war.
					
					 Ri Ung Jong (79), a war veteran living in Kaesong City, told KCNA:
					
					 "It is quite natural for a citizen to join the army to defend the country from any invasion.
					
					 However, respected Marshal Kim Jong Un invited us, war veterans, to the celebrations of the war victory day in Pyongyang, highly appreciating the fighting spirit we displayed during the war.
					
					 This loving care will be always kept in the minds of all of war veterans. I will intensify the activity of war veterans' itinerant art squad intended to implant the wartime spirit into the minds of rising generations."
					
					 Yu Hyong Sang (80), a war veteran living in Ryanggang Province, said:
					
					 "I came to Pyongyang aboard a plane and was warmly welcomed by Pyongyang citizens. And now I received a delegate certificate bearing a picture of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The past feats will be of value when fresh feats are performed.
					
					 Although I am old, I will do good things conducive to building a thriving nation in the same spirit as was displayed in the wartime."
					
					 Pang Yong Gup (85), a war veteran living in North Phyongan Province, said:
					
					 "The history of the war victory is everlasting as there is respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is wisely leading the younger generations to creditably carry forward the exploits and fighting spirit of the preceding generations."

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visits Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visits Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- An endless of stream of service persons, people from all walks of life, school youth and children visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower.
					 More than 70,000 persons visited the tower this year and at least 6 millions since its completion.
					
					 The tower is a monumental edifice demonstrative of the stamina of the army and people of the DPRK who won a historic victory by smashing the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, under the leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the invincible and iron-willed commander.
					
					 It consists of main theme sculpture "Victory" and subsidiary theme group sculptures including "Heroes of Wolmi Island", "Defenders of Height 1211", "Battle for Crossing River Rakdong" and "Assistance to Front by the People in the Rear".
					
					 The visitors vowed to mercilessly wipe out the enemies by displaying the honor of heroic Korea with the same ardent patriotism and fighting spirit as displayed by the KPA fighters and people who shed their blood to defend even an inch of the country's land, if the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors dare provoke.

articles.title: Minutes of Cooperation Signed between DPRK, Lao Governments
articles.content:
Minutes of Cooperation Signed between DPRK, Lao Governments
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Minutes of the second meeting of the DPRK and Lao Inter-governmental Joint Committee for Economic, Trade, Scientific and Technological Cooperation was signed here on Friday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and other officials concerned and from the Lao side members of the Lao government economic delegation headed by Siaosavath Savengsuksa, vice-minister of Industry and Commerce, and Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Lao Government Economic Delegation Goes back Home
articles.content:
Lao Government Economic Delegation Goes back Home
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Lao government economic delegation headed by Siaosavath Savengsuksa, vice-minister of Industry and Commerce, went back home on Friday.

articles.title: Chinese Tour Group Goes Back Home
articles.content:
Chinese Tour Group Goes Back Home
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The tourist group of Shanghai region of China headed by Feng Yiming, director general of the Chinese Shanghai International Tours Group, Co. Ltd., by Pyongyang-Shanghai international route went back home Friday by air.

articles.title: Congratulations to New Ghanaian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to New Ghanaian President
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to John Dramani Mahama upon his assumption of office as president of Ghana.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger, wishing him success in his responsible work for the national unity and economic development.

articles.title: DPRK Papers Call for Winning Final Victory in Struggle against Imperialism
articles.content:
DPRK Papers Call for Winning Final Victory in Struggle against Imperialism
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean people mark July 27 as a revolutionary holiday. This will demonstrate the ever-victorious spirit of the army and people of the DPRK who strive to win a final victory in their struggle against imperialism through successful inheritance of exploits achieved by the elder generations and their fighting spirit, say the DPRK leading newspapers Friday in their editorials dedicated to the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 July 27, war victory day of the Korean people, was a brilliant fruition of the idea and leadership of President Kim Il Sung, says Rodong Sinmun, and goes on:
					
					 The President's outstanding military idea and war methods served as a powerful weapon that thwarted the sinister scenarios hatched by imperialist plot-breeders, and his matchless pluck and grit helped effect a signal turn in all stages of war.
					
					 The great history of the war victory has been successfully carried forward thanks to leader Kim Jong Il. The DPRK has demonstrated its might as an invincible military power and a nuclear weapons state and its army and people have grown to be heroic army and people in the course of making a long journey of Songun revolution following Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Saying that all the victories won in the history of the Korean people's struggle against imperialism mean a victory of great ideology, outstanding strategy and tactics, the daily praises the DPRK for winning victory in the anti-imperialist struggle by dint of its tremendous mental power.
					
					 It notes with high appreciation that Kim Jong Un is an eternal symbol of victory of the DPRK, adding that it is the highest honor for the army and people of the DPRK, who have emerged ever-victorious being blessed with illustrious leaders generation after generation, to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 Minju Joson calls for winning a final victory by giving fullest play to the matchless mental power consolidated in the protracted Songun revolution under the military-first leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lee Myung Bak's "Apology to People" Termed "Burlesque Deceiving People"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lee Myung Bak's "Apology to People" Termed "Burlesque Deceiving People"
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak made an "apology to the people" for the scandals of his relatives and close confidants on July 24. "Disappointing thing happened near him" at a time when he was "making efforts on his own way" to pursue "clear politics", Lee said, adding he "could not raise his head as his mind collapsed" and he "would accept any rebuke". He even said that he cannot neglect his duty even a moment and he would strictly conduct state affairs by turning a new leaf.
					 Minju Joson in a bylined commentary Friday terms this useless as it means that he will not resign for the blame on the scandals of his relatives and confidants since he is clear in politics. The paper continues:
					
					 He read out a short "written apology to the people" and left the press conference room in two minutes so that reporters could not put questions to him.
					
					 All scandals of his relatives and confidants are linked with him.
					
					 He dropped his head twice, blaring that "he would accept any rebuke" while crying out for "clear politics", "efforts" and "achievements". It was a drama to elicit sympathy.
					
					 His "apology to the people" is nothing but the "burlesque to deceive the people".
					
					 People of all social standings are blaming the Lee "government" and Chongwadae, saying that they do not fix the door properly even after horse left the stable, Lee was engrossed in hushing up the public whenever there occurred scandals of his close confidants and who will abide by laws, putting trust in the "president" and "government".
					
					 In a word, he went out for wool and came back shorn. One's evil doings will rebound on oneself.

articles.title: Minju Joson New Peace Mechanism in Korean Peninsula Called for
articles.content:
Minju Joson New Peace Mechanism in Korean Peninsula Called for
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The issue of ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula has not yet been settled and an abnormal state, neither war nor peace, continues there. The U.S. is entirely to blame for this, says Minju Joson Friday in a bylined commentary.
					 For the last 59 years the U.S. has turned its face away from the principled demand and sincere efforts made by the DPRK for replacing the Armistice Agreement (AA) by a peace accord and ensuring a lasting peace in the Korean Peninsula. On the contrary, it has wantonly violated AA, the commentary notes, citing data to prove this. It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. brought to light its undisguised attempt to stifle the DPRK by force of arms. It compelled the DPRK to take a counter-measure for self-defence.
					
					 Despite the DPRK's warning, the U.S. has persisted in its hostile policy toward the DPRK. As a result, the Korean Peninsula has become the world's most dangerous hotspot and a source of nuclear war for which the anachronistic and reckless military moves of the U.S. are to blame.
					
					 In case a war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula, it will go beyond the boundary of Korea in no time and lead to a World war, imposing tremendous disasters upon mankind again.
					
					 The only way for heading off a war is to immediately end ceasefire and establish a lasting peace mechanism on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 This is clearly proved by the history of confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. that lasted for nearly six decades since the ceasefire.
					
					 The issue of ending the state of ceasefire and building a new peace mechanism on the Korean Peninsula will serve as a touchstone judging who truly wants peace and who does not.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants to see peace on the Korean Peninsula, it should respond to a fair and reasonable proposal raised by the DPRK for the replacement of the AA by a peace treaty.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to act with responsibility for the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Letters from Diplomatic Envoys of Cambodia, Pakistan
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Letters from Diplomatic Envoys of Cambodia, Pakistan
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and letters from Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK Chhorn Hay and the charge d' affaires ad interim of the Pakistani embassy here. They were meant to congratulate him on his holding of the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 The floral baskets and letters were handed over to officials concerned separately.

articles.title: Brazilian Int'l Secretary Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Brazilian Int'l Secretary Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Ricardo Alemao Abreu, international relations secretary of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, Friday visited the statues of President　Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid homage to them.
					 He laid a bouquet before their statues before paying tribute to them.
					
					 He arrived here by air today.

articles.title: Intention to Boost Ties with WPK Reiterated: Greek Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Intention to Boost Ties with WPK Reiterated: Greek Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Chun Guk, DPRK ambassador to Greece, on July 20 paid a courtesy call on Aleka Papariga, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Greece (CPG).
					 Expressing firm solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea, the general secretary said:
					
					 I am convinced that the WPK would make fresh success in its efforts to build a thriving country true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the CPG to develop the relations with the WPK.
					
					 Both parties stand together in the common front against imperialism.

articles.title: Rungna Islet Takes on New Look
articles.content:
Rungna Islet Takes on New Look
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Rungna Islet in the Taedong River flowing through the capital city of Pyongyang has taken on a new look as a pleasure ground.
					 Choe Tok Nam, an officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces who took part in the construction of this pleasure ground, told KCNA:
					
					 "Rungna Islet, a scenic spot in Pyongyang, has turned into a fashionable pleasure ground under the deep care of Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 I was surprised to see him at the ceremony of opening the Rungna People's Pleasure Ground, because he came to the ground a day before the ceremony.
					
					 The Supreme Commander visited the pleasure ground several times during its construction.
					
					 He gave detailed guidance to the construction of dolphinarium, wading pool, fun fair, mini golf course and all other facilities in the ground so that they could be built on the highest level to suit the citizens' emotion and aesthetic sense. He also initiated an embankment project to prevent the islet from flood."
					
					 Han Chol Sung, deputy department director of the Ministry of Light Industry, said:
					
					 "At the ceremony held ahead of the war victory day, I was happy to see Marshal Kim Jong Un with a broad smile in his face.
					
					 While touring the pleasure ground, he was pleased to see students enjoying themselves at the wading pool and hear laughter of citizens at funfair. People's happiness was just his pleasure.
					
					 The Rungna People's Pleasure Ground is a product of his noble outlook on the people and future."

articles.title: Hideous Terrorism Planned by U.S. and S. Korea Denounced
articles.content:
Hideous Terrorism Planned by U.S. and S. Korea Denounced
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on July 20 in denunciation of the hideous terrorism against the DPRK planned by the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime.
					 Everybody knows that the U.S. imperialists, Yankees have always been behind all sorts of acts of hostility towards the DPRK, symbol of truth and justice, and that the south Korean puppet regime were in the van of carrying out them, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The recent hostile act beyond imagination which the south Korean regime planned at the instigation and under the sponsorship of the Yankees to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK was a politically-motivated terrorism in the true sense of the word and it can be choreographed only by the Yankees and south Korean regime.
					
					 The real intention of the U.S. is to provoke a war by escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula and fish in troubled waters from the fratricidal strife. 
					
					 However, no political and physical terrorism will be effective enough to bring down socialism of Juche and undercut the dignity of the supreme leadership deeply cherished in the minds of the Korean people.
					
					 The committee strongly denounces the U.S. imperialists and south Korean regime for their reckless, hideous terrorism against the DPRK.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Introduces Hungnam Fertilizer Complex
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Introduces Hungnam Fertilizer Complex
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Chinese People's Daily on July 23 carried an article titled "Technical updating promotes improvement of people's living standard" which was contributed by its correspondent in Pyongyang after visiting the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex. 
					 The article said that President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il gave on-the-spot guidance to the complex several times. 
					
					 The complex is dynamically pushing forward the construction of the ammonium production process through the gasification of brown coal to reduce production cost and increase the production of chemical fertilizer, it said, and went on:
					
					 Now the first phase project of the process was completed and a big advance has been made in the production. 
					
					 The complex has put production of chemical fertilizer on a normal footing after the successful updating of the production process, thus making a great contribution to improving people's living standard.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Holding of Title of DPRK Marshal Celebrated Worldwide
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Holding of Title of DPRK Marshal Celebrated Worldwide 
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The world is now excited at the news that the dear respected Kim Jong Un was awarded the title of DPRK Marshal. 
					 Just in less than 10 minutes after the special news was published, world media echoed it all at once. 
					
					 More than 10,000 media of the world carried it as breaking news under such titles as "DPRK Awards Title of Marshal to First Secretary Kim Jong Un, Special Report Issued" and "New Supreme Leader Title Awarded to DPRK Leader Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The Cuban Institute of Radio and Television, Reuters, AFP, the New York Times and a Cambodian paper carried the news of the decision on awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un together with a picture he had taken with commanding officers of the Korean People's Army and other pictures of his revolutionary activities. 
					
					 Media gave wide publicity to it and vied with each other to report the news in prime time. 
					
					 They said that leader Kim Jong Un's holding of the title of DPRK Marshal means the firm establishment of his leadership system over the KPA. This is an expression of the will of the party, government and people of the DPRK to further strengthen Kim Jong Un's leadership system over whole country. 
					
					 Progressive people have extended warm congratulations to him. 
					
					 The military attaches corps here presented a floral basket and congratulatory letter to him and the chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, the general director of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., and the president of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, China sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions. 
					
					 A delegation of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union and personages of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia and the Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries. 
					
					 A celebration meeting took place in Basel, Switzerland, and colorful political and cultural events are widely held worldwide. 
					
					 Political parties, organizations and individuals of many countries such as Bangladesh, Myanmar, Guinea, Democratic Congo, UK, Denmark, Germany and Peru made public statements and articles reflecting their best wishes for him.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Regime Hit for Their Attempted Terrorist Act
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Regime Hit for Their Attempted Terrorist Act
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification issued a commentary on July 25 to denounce the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea for its attempted terrorist act against the DPRK under the U.S. manipulation.
					 The commentary recalled that in a press conference in Pyongyang on July 19 a criminal confessed his crimes. He was arrested while trying to commit subversion and sabotage act after infiltrating into the DPRK.
					
					 World people stunned at the anti-DPRK smear campaign of the U.S. and south Korean intelligence agencies that was exposed by the criminal, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. manipulated the attempted heinous terrorist act behind the scene. This fact gave the lie to the U.S. claims that it has no hostile intention toward the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is condemning the recent crime as an insult to the dignity of its supreme leadership, a physical attack on it and a war act equivalent to invasion, not as a simple subversion and sabotage act.

articles.title: Checking of S. Korean Dictatorial Forces' Moves to Stay in Power Called for
articles.content:
Checking of S. Korean Dictatorial Forces' Moves to Stay in Power Called for
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Members of south Korean civic and public organizations and students held an all-people action in front of the Ssangryong Motor Factory in Kyonggi Province on July 20 at which they declared the struggle for judging the puppet regime and checking the moves of the "Saenuri Party" to stay in power. They included the All-People Committee for Honoring Memory of Victims and Reinstating the Discharged Workers of the Ssangryong Motor Factory and the Confederation of Trade Unions.
					 The participants said all the workers should get united as one to have the issue of the Ssangryong Motor Factory settled.
					
					 They underlined the need to set right the structural faults in this land such as part-time jobs, layoff, etc. this year.
					
					 They called upon the workers to certainly judge the Lee Myung Bak regime which brutally persecuted workers.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" is following in the footsteps of Lee's dictatorial rule, they said, calling for checking the treacherous political party's moves to stay in power without fail.
					
					 Earlier, they held a rally for the all-people action at the plaza of Phyongthaek Railway Station at which they called for struggling to bring about the world free from part-time jobs and violence.

articles.title: British Organizations Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
British Organizations Congratulate Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on July 18 to mark the dear respected Kim Jong Un's holding of the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 The statement extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It is the manifestation of the absolute trust and support of all the Korean people for him to award him the title of DPRK Marshal, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It also represents the firm confidence of the Koreans in his sagacious leadership ability and commanding art.
					
					 He demonstrated his gifted extraordinary military disposition during his inspection of Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Jan. 1 this year.
					
					 The Korean people will smash the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet regime and reunify the country without fail under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the great sun of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Romanian Political Party
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Romania on July 22 posted on its Internet homepage "The Juche Idea" the full text of general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The work, published on August 4, 1997 deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and sets forth tasks and ways for achieving national reunification on their basis.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Is Sun of Songun Korea: Danish, Swedish Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Is Sun of Songun Korea: Danish, Swedish Personages
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Personages of Demark and Sweden issued statements to congratulate the dear respected Kim Jong Un upon his holding of the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, on July 21 said that awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un is an expression of all the Korean people's his praise of the great exploits he performed in the revolution and construction and, at the same time, a historic event of great significance in opening a new heyday in the DPRK.
					
					 He praised Kim Jong Un as a peerlessly great man and the sun of Songun Korea who leads the Korean revolution to victory and glory, adding that DPRK friends in Demark are convinced the army and people of the DPRK would foil all sorts of imperialists' challenges and win only victory under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, on July 20 said that Kim Jong Un's holding of DPRK Marshal proves once again that he leads overall state affairs with confidence amid boundless reverence and absolute confidence from his army and people.
					
					 Expressing belief that the Korean people would continue winning victories in their efforts to oppose imperialism and defend socialism, closely united around Marshal Kim Jong Un, the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea expressed full solidarity for them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Is Defender of Socialist Cause: Party Leader of Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Is Defender of Socialist Cause: Party Leader of Benin
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin (SPB), made public a statement on July 19 congratulating the dear respected Kim Jong Un on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 He said that Kim Jong Un is a peerlessly great man, defender of the socialist cause and honorary member of the SPB, praising him as eternal banner of victory for the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's holding of DPRK Marshal is a reflection of the unanimous aspiration of not only the Korean people but the world people. He has wisely led the Korean People's Army with his gifted stratagem and commanding art, while always making long journey for Songun leadership together with leader Kim Jong Il, he said, and went on:
					
					 The sovereignty of socialist Korea is being firmly guaranteed and the DPRK is giving fuller play to its dignity and might as an invincible military power thanks to the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The human cause of independence will advance victoriously as long as there is Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Celebration Meeting Held in Switzerland
articles.content:
Celebration Meeting Held in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A celebration meeting was held in Switzerland on July 21 as regards the dear respected Kim Jong Un's holding of the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 Present there were members of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and other people and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Bern.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the committee, in a speech said that it is a great historic event in the cause of Songun revolution of Korea that Kim Jong Un was awarded the title of DPRK Marshal. 
					
					 The chairman went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un has deeply grasped the Juche-oriented military ideas, strategy and tactics of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and strengthened the Korean People's Army into invincible revolutionary armed forces. He is indeed an ever-victorious and iron-willed brilliant commander and a prominent strategist.
					
					 Socialist Korea would surely triumph in the standoff with the imperialists and all other hostile forces under his leadership.
					
					 A congratulatory message to him was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Acto central por 59o aniversario de victoria en la guerra coreana
articles.content:
Acto central por 59o aniversario de victoria en la guerra coreana
 Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 27 en Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 59o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, fuerzas armadas y el poder, las entidades sociales, ministerios, organos centrales, los delegados veteranos participantes en la pasada guerra, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los benemeritos, los trabajadores capitalinos, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los compatriotas en ultramar que permanecen en la patria socialista.
					
					 El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC. 
					
					 El informante dijo que el 27 de Julio es el dia de la segunda liberacion en que bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea lograron la brillante  victoria tras vencer a los agresores imperialistas norteamericanos que se jactaban de la "superpotencia" del mundo y prosigue:
					
					 La pasada guerra fue la justa para defender la libertad y la independencia de la patria y la mas enconada sin precedente en la historia de la guerra.
					
					 El imperialismo norteamericano movilizo en pasada  guerra coreana mas de 2 millones de los agresores armados de 16 paises lacayunos inclusive sus colosales tropas agresivas y el ejercito titere del Sur de Corea y se valio de todas maneras y metodos mas crueles de guerra.
					
					 Sin embargo, no pudo arrodillar al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea dirigidos por el Presidente    Kim Il Sung, genial Comandante invencible y destacado estratega militar.
					
					 Al margen de la autoctona idea militar y la sabia estrategia y tactica del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el espiritu indoblegable de lucha del ejercito y el pueblo que combatieron en acato a la direccion del Lider, no pueden pensar en la victoria de la RPDC en la guerra contra los poderosos enemigos imperialistas norteamericanos y sus seguidores.
					
					 Durante la guerra, el pueblo hermano chino y los pueblos del mundo amantes de la paz siempre estaban al lado del pueblo coreano que libra la sagrada guerra justa.
					
					 Bajo la bandera de "resistir a los yanquis, ayudar a Corea, y defender el hogar y el pais propios", los excelentes hijos del pueblo chino acudieron al frente coreano y compartieron la vida y muerte en la misma trinchera con el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea dedicando su vida, creando asi el noble ejemplo de internacionalismo en el combate contra el enemigo comun.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo no lo olvidaran jamas.
					
					 Despues del cese de fuego de la guerra, la batalla ardua de confrontacion con los imperialismos se ha venido continuando.
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il practico en todas las ramas la politica del Songun y condujo sabiamente el enfrentamiento nuclear con EE.UU. y la batalla por la defensa del socialismo, de manera que abrio la nueva epoca de victoria en la batalla antiimperialista y antiyanqui.
					
					 El desfile militar por el Dia del Sol del presente ano efectuado por la iniciativa directiva del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il fue un gran festival de los triunfadores que demostro que la superioridad militar y tecnica no es mas el monopolio de los imperialistas y paso para siempre la era en que EE.UU. amenazaba y chantajeaba a la RPDC con las armas  nucleares.
					
					 La direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un deviene la vida del EPC y la bandera invencible.
					
					 El estaba siempre desde temprano al lado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el camino largo del Songun, para fortalecer el EPC como fidedigna patrulla y firme sosten de la revolucion del Songun e hizo el aporte excepcional en glorificar la patria como potencia militar de talla mundial.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea bien conscientes de que al seguir la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, poseedor del temperamento de ataque de tipo del Paektu, el destacado arte de mando militar, la audacia de acero y la determinacion fuerte, la victoria sera siempre la nuestra, manifiestan sin reserva el temperamento y la voluntad de aniquilar a los enemigos.
					
					 Aunque pasaron casi 60 anos desde el cese de fuego, no se mantiene la paz en esta tierra y la situacion sigue siendo tensa.
					
					 No se ha cambiado la naturaleza agresiva del imperialismo yanqui de ocupar a toda la Peninsula Coreana tras aplastar con las fuerzas a la RPDC.
					
					 Nuestro ejercito y pueblo no desean la guerra, pero, no la temen.
					
					 El imperialismo norteamericano y sus fuerzas seguidoras provocando la guerra agresiva piensan equivocadamente en quedarse en vivo y sano su territorio por encontrarse lejos.
					
					 Si EE.UU. desencadena otra vez la guerra en esta tierra, todo el partido y pueblo confiandose mutuamente libraran la guerra de todo el pueblo y alcanzaran sin falta el deseo historico de la reunificacion de la patria obligando a los enemigos  a firmar no en el acuerdo de armisticio sino en el acta de capitulacion.

articles.title: Efectuada velada de salvas por 27 de julio
articles.content:
Efectuada velada de salvas por 27 de julio
 Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy por la noche a la orilla del rio Pothong la velada de salvas en homenaje al 59o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 Varios lugares de esta capital tales como la orilla del rio Pothong, donde esta erigido el Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, la plaza de victoria de guerra, las avenidas Phonghwa y An Sang Thaek y la colina Moran, estaban repletos de trabajadores de diversos estratos y los jovenes y ninos escolares reunidos para presenciarla.
					
					 La vieron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Hwang Sun Hui, Ri Ul Sol, Kim Chol Man, Kim Jong Gak, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Kwak Pom Gi, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Chang Sop, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Pyong Sam, Jo Yon Jun, Thae Jong Su y el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea Kim Yong Dae, los funcionarios del Partido, fuerzas armadas, instituciones del Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las ramas de la  ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los heroes y los benemeritos.
					
					 Los delegados veteranos al acto festivo del 59o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria tomaron asientos en el lugar de la velada.
					
					 Fueron invitados el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los compatriotas en ultramar  que permanecen en la patria socialista y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					 El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal Kim Jong Gak, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					 El dijo que la historica victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria fue la victoria de la autoctona idea militar, estrategia y tactica del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung y la indoblegable fuerza espiritual del ejercito y pueblo de Corea unidos compactamente en torno al lider y prosiguio:
					
					 La velada de salvas de hoy es el gran festival que elogia altamente las proezas revolucionarias de Songun de los grandes Generalisimos, quienes glorificaron la invencible historia y demuestra el impetu heroico de la Corea del Songun que avanza con dinamismo hacia la victoria final bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 En medio de la interpretacion de la cancion "27 de julio, dia de la victoria" se dispararon las salvas de distintos colores al cielo nocturno de la capital.
					
					 Ellos no contenian la emocion pensando en el Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un quien les invito en los actos festivos por el dia de la victoria en la guerra que tienen lugar en esta capital diciendo que todos los veteranos son mas preciosos que un monton de oro y les hizo participar en la velada de salvas tan magnifica.
					
					 La presente velada de salvas puso de pleno manifiesto la conviccion y la voluntad revolucionaria de todo el ejercito y pueblo de glorificar para siempre las proezas revolucionarias de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y  lograr el triunfo final al luchar con el espiritu de combate de aquellos dias de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria uniendose firmemente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Se ofrece el banquete por 59o aniversario de victoria en guerra
articles.content:
Se ofrece el banquete por 59o aniversario de victoria en guerra
 Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Se ofrecieron el dia 27 los banquetes en la Casa Mokran, el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo, los Restaurantes Okryu y Chongryu, el Hotel Internacional Yanggakdo en honor de los veteranos delegados participantes en los festejos por el 59o aniversario de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 Asistieron a las ocasiones Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios interesados y los veteranos delegados
					
					 En las ocasiones Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam y Pak To Chun intervinieron.
					
					 Los oradores felicitaron calidamente a los ex combatientes antijaponeses, los veteranos de guerra, los indoblegables combatientes patrioticos por la reunificacion, invitados en los banquetes ofrecidas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					 Destacaron que los veteranos participantes en la guerra deben legar a las generaciones venideras la fidelidad al partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo y el espiritu de colectivismo y heroismo masivo, manifestados en los enconados dias de guerra, para que ellas continuen de generacion en generacion la causa del PTC.

articles.title: Orquesta Unhasu ofrece concierto por el 27 de julio
articles.content:
Orquesta Unhasu ofrece concierto por el 27 de julio
 Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang el concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu dedicado al 59o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 Lo presenciaron Choe Yong Rim y otros cuadros directivos del Partido y el Estado, los funcionarios de los ministerios, los organos centrales, los sectores de educacion, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					 En el concierto se interpreto el himno nacional.
					
					 Los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico las imperecederas hazanas realizadas en la pasada guerra por el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, invencible Comandante de acero y Heroe legendario y los meritos de los soldados heroes y habitantes que defendieron el territorio patrio derramando la sangre.
					
					 Elogiaron calurosamente las inmortales proezas de gran Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien defendio con la original politica del Songun el destino de la patria y la nacion y logro siempre victorias en la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui y por la defensa del socialismo.
					
					 El solo femenino "Cancion de la pionera Chollima", el duo mixto y pangchang "Tu eres madre", el sexteto mixto y coro "Nuestro Dirigente amado por pueblo" y otras piezas emocionaron el alma de los espectadores.
					
					 El concierto, lleno de impetu revolucionario arranco efusiva ovacion del publico.

articles.title: Conjunto Artistico del EPC ofrece funcion por el 27 de julio
articles.content:
Conjunto Artistico del EPC ofrece funcion por el 27 de julio
 Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la funcion combinada de musica y danza del Conjunto Artistico del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dedicada al 59o aniversario de la victoria en la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953).
					 Disfrutaron la funcion los oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					 La obertura compuesta de las canciones "27 de julio, dia de la victoria" y "Por la unica patria" dio inicio a la funcion.
					
					 En el repertorio de la ocasion estuvieron las piezas de varios generos como el coro mixto "!Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung!" y "Cancion de la defensa de la Patria", el baile Tap "Imagen del heroe", el solo femenino y danza de la obra maestra "?Donde esta el querido General?", etc.
					
					 Los interpretes alabaron apasionadamente las inmortales hazanas por la victoria en guerra del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung quien creo el milagro militar digno de transmitirse para siempre en la historia mundial de guerras al vencer al barbaro imperialismo norteamericano con su extraordinaria inteligencia militar, incomparable coraje y extraordinario arte de mando.
					
					 El solo femenino "Trueno en el pico Jong Il", la cancion acompanada de Kayagum (instrumento musical coreano) y Pangchang (coro del foso) "Arirang del puerto Chol", "Ongheya de victorias del Songun" y otras piezas recordaron las hazanas revolucionarias del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il que situo en el plano cimero la dignidad de la patria emprendiendo sin treguas su largo camino del Songun.
					
					 Dejaron profundamente emocionados a los espectadores el sexteto mixto "Nuestro Dirigente adorado por el pueblo", el octeto masculino "Seremos inmortales en la defensa del mar patrio" y otros programas.

articles.title: Celebran en Corea el dia de victoria en la guerra coreana
articles.content:
Celebran en Corea el dia de victoria en la guerra coreana
 Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 59o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953), tuvieron lugar en Pyongyang y varias localidades de Corea los actos festivos de los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes.
					 Ellos visitaron las estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y sus retratos con amplia sonrisa, erigidos en Pyongyang y las capitales provinciales, para rendirles homenaje y recorrieron los lugares de interes historico donde estan impregnadas las hazanas de Kim Il Sung realizadas por la victoria en la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					 En el capitalino Teatro Nacional de Drama se ofrecio la drama revolucionaria "Bajo la bandera de la victoria", en el Circo de Pyongyang y de Moranbong, la funcion acrobatica combinada y en el Teatro Moranbong, el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este y Casa de Musica Yun I Sang, el concierto por el dia de la victoria en la guerra.
					
					 Los integrantes del grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil desarrollaron ante la plaza frente a la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la funcion por tal motivo. 
					
					 Los funcionarios y miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC), los obreros y veteranos de guerra presenciaron la funcion del grupo artistico central de obreros de la FGSC "Nuestro eterno 27 de julio".
					
					 El grupo de propaganda artistica central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea y las gremiales de la misma ofrecieron una funcion artistica de las canciones creadas en el periodo de guerra en la explanada frente al Museo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					 Los miembros de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas y otros agricultores de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur presentaron un concierto de las mismas canciones en la Granja Cooperativa de Joyang del distrito Hamju donde estan grabadas las hazanas de guia de los grandes hombres sin pares.
					
					 En el campo de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Orangchon, las funcionarias y miembros de la UMDC de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte estimularon a los constructores a la creacion de meritos interpretando bien las canciones del tiempo de guerra y las otras que reflejan el gran respeto a los Generales Insignes.
					
					 Los artistas de las provincias de Ryanggang, Kangwon, Phyong-an del Norte y Phyong-an del Sur felicitaron a traves de sus funciones a los veteranos y los que realizaron meritos en el tiempo de guerra.
					
					 Tuvo lugar la misma actividad en la ciudad de Kaesong situada en la linea de demarcacion militar.
					
					 Los jovenes y estudiantes de diferentes localidades celebraron el 27 de julio con bailes de festejo.
